solution.text:
Area of the polygon = Area Of Trapezium (1) + Area of Rectangle (2)
\(= \frac 12 \times (a+b) \times c + b \times (h-c)\)
\(=\frac 12 \times _{{(2*j) + 6}}_ \times _{j}_ + _{{j+5}}_ \ times 3\)
=\(_{{((j+3)*j) + (3*(j+5))}}_ dm^2\)

content.text: In the polygon below, a=_{{j+1}}_ dm, b=_{{3*j}}_ dm, c= _{j}_ dm, h= _{{2*j}}_ dm
